db:select.db:sql: Select a.PROD_CODE,a.CURR_CODE,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(),a.CLIENT_ID,a.CLIENT_ACCT_NUM,a.COMM_DATE,a.JOINT_FLAG,a.ACCT_ID,a.ACCT_TYPE,ad.VAL_DATE,ad.CURR_ASSET_VAL_AMT,ad.TOT_INVEST_AMT,ad.TOT_WDRAW_AMT,ad.TOT_INCOME_AMT,ad.ENCASH_VALUE_AMT,ad.BANKING_BALANCE_AMT,ad.NET_CHANGE from wealthmanagement.wm_account a join wealthmanagement.wm_acct_details ad on a.ACCT_ID=ad.ACCT_ID where CLIENT_ID=:CLIENT_ID

ee:message.ee:set-payload:
%dw 2.0 output application/json skipNullOn="everywhere" --- payload map(payload,payload01)-> { "clientId":payload.CLIENT_ID, "clientAccountNumber":payload.CLIENT_ACCT_NUM, "accountId":payload.ACCT_ID, "accountType":payload.ACCT_TYPE, "productCode":payload.PROD_CODE, "currencyCode":payload.CURR_CODE, "commDate":payload.COMM_DATE, "jointFlag":payload.JOINT_FLAG,
"validityDate":payload.VAL_DATE, "totalInvestmentAmount":payload.TOT_INVEST_AMT, "totalWithdrawnAmount":payload.TOT_WDRAW_AMT, "totalIncomeAmount":payload.TOT_INCOME_AMT, "currentAssetValueAmount":payload.CURR_ASSET_VAL_AMT, "bankingBalanceAmount":payload.BANKING_BALANCE_AMT, "encashmentValueAmount":payload.ENCASH_VALUE_AMT, "netChange":payload.NET_CHANGE, "lastUpdated": payload.LAST_UPDATED }

db:insert.db:sql: INSERT INTO wealthmanagement.wm_client ( name, first_name, middle_name, last_name,birth_date, phone, email, shipping_street, shipping_city, shipping_country, shipping_state, shipping_postalcode, annual_income, citizenship,sf_client_id) VALUES ( :name, :first_name, :middle_name, :last_name, :birth_date, :phone, :email, :shipping_street, :shipping_city, :shipping_country, :shipping_state, :shipping_postalcode, :annual_income, :citizenship , :sf_client_id)
db:insert.db:input-parameters:
#[{
"name":payload.name, "first_name": payload.firstName, "middle_name": payload.middleName, "last_name": payload.lastName, "birth_date": payload.birthDate , "phone": payload.phone , "email": payload.email, "shipping_street":payload.shippingStreet, "shipping_city": payload.shippingCity, "shipping_country": payload.shippingCountry, "shipping_state": payload.shippingState, "shipping_postalcode": payload.shippingPostalCode, "annual_income": payload.annualIncome, "citizenship": payload.citizenship, "salesforceClientId": payload.sfClientId }]

db:select.db:sql: Select * from wealthmanagement.wm_account where CLIENT_ID=:CLIENT_ID AND ACCT_TYPE=:ACCT_TYPE

Select a.PROD_CODE,a.CURR_CODE,a.CLIENT_ID,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(),ad.LAST_UPDATED as ACCOUNTDETAILS_LASTUPDATED,a.SF_PRODUCT_ID,COMM_DATE,a.JOINT_FLAG,a.ACCT_ID,a.ACCT_TYPE,a.ACCT_NAME,a.SF_SEC_CLIENT_ID,a.SF_HOUSEHOLD_ID,ad.VAL_DATE,ad.CURR_ASSET_VAL_AMT,ad.TOT_INVEST_AMT,ad.TOT_WDRAW_AMT,ad.TOT_INCOME_AMT,ad.ENCASH_VALUE_AMT,ad.BANKING_BALANCE_AMT,ad.NET_CHANGE from wealthmanagement.wm_account a join wealthmanagement.wm_acct_details ad on a.ACCT_ID=ad.ACCT_ID where ad.LAST_UPDATED>:time

ee:message.ee:set-payload:
%dw 2.0 output application/json skipNullOn="everywhere" --- payload map(payload,payload01)-> { "account": { "clientId": payload.CLIENT_ID, "accountId": payload.ACCT_ID, "sfProductId": payload.SF_PRODUCT_ID, "accountType": payload.ACCT_TYPE, "commencementDate": payload.COMM_DATE, "sfAccountName": payload.ACCT_NAME, "productCode": payload.PROD_CODE, "currencyCode": payload.CURR_CODE, "jointFlag": payload.JOINT_FLAG, "sfSecondaryClientId": payload.SF_SEC_CLIENT_ID, "sfhouseholdId": payload.SF_HOUSEHOLD_ID, }, "valuationDetails": {
"valuationDate": payload.VAL_DATE, "bankingBalanceAmount": payload.BANKING_BALANCE_AMT, "totalInvestmentAmount": payload.TOT_INVEST_AMT, "totalWithdrawAmount": payload.TOT_WDRAW_AMT, "totalIncomeAmount": payload.TOT_INCOME_AMT, "currentAssetValueAmount": payload.CURR_ASSET_VAL_AMT, "encashmentValueAmount":payload.ENCASH_VALUE_AMT, "netChange": payload.NET_CHANGE, }, "currentTimestamp": payload."CURRENT_TIMESTAMP()", "lastUpdatedTime": payload.ACCOUNTDETAILS_LASTUPDATED, }

db:select.db:sql: select ad.PROD_CODE,a.ACCT_ID,ad.CURR_ASSET_VAL_AMT,ad.ENCASH_VALUE_AMT,ad.NET_CHANGE,a.ACCT_TYPE,a.CLIENT_ID,c.sf_client_id FROM wealthmanagement.wm_acct_details ad join wealthmanagement.wm_account a on ad.ACCT_ID=a.ACCT_ID join wealthmanagement.wm_client c on a.CLIENT_ID=c.CLIENT_ID where a.CLIENT_ID=:CLIENT_ID and ACCT_TYPE="INVESTMENT"

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/json skipNullOn="everywhere" var curr=payload.CURR_ASSET_VAL_AMT[0 to -1] var encash=payload.ENCASH_VALUE_AMT[0 to -1] --- "investment": { "salesforceClientId": payload[-1].sf_client_id, "currentvalueSummary" : sum(curr) as String {format: "0.00"}, "encashmentvalueSummary": sum(encash) as String {format: "0.00"}, "account": payload map()-> { "accountId": $.ACCT_ID, "clientId": $.CLIENT_ID, "planName": $.PROD_CODE, "accountType": $.ACCT_TYPE, "currentValue": $.CURR_ASSET_VAL_AMT, "encashmentValue": $.ENCASH_VALUE_AMT, "netChange": $.NET_CHANGE } }

db:select.db:sql: select ad.PROD_CODE,ad.BANKING_BALANCE_AMT,a.ACCT_ID,ad.CURR_ASSET_VAL_AMT,ad.ENCASH_VALUE_AMT,ad.NET_CHANGE,a.ACCT_TYPE,a.CLIENT_ID,c.sf_client_id FROM wealthmanagement.wm_acct_details ad join wealthmanagement.wm_account a on ad.ACCT_ID=a.ACCT_ID join wealthmanagement.wm_client c on a.CLIENT_ID=c.CLIENT_ID where a.CLIENT_ID=:CLIENT_ID and ACCT_TYPE="Banking"

ee:message.ee:set-payload:
%dw 2.0 output application/json skipNullOn="everywhere" var curr=payload.CURR_ASSET_VAL_AMT[0 to -1] var encash=payload.ENCASH_VALUE_AMT[0 to -1] --- "banking": { "salesforceClientId": payload[-1].sf_client_id, "currentvalueSummary" : sum(curr) as String {format: "0.00"}, "encashmentvalueSummary": sum(encash) as String {format: "0.00"}, "account": payload map()-> { "accountId": $.ACCT_ID, "clientId": $.CLIENT_ID, "planName": $.PROD_CODE, "accountType": $.ACCT_TYPE, "cashBalance": $.BANKING_BALANCE_AMT
} }

db:select.db:sql: select ad.PROD_CODE,a.ACCT_ID,ad.CURR_ASSET_VAL_AMT,ad.ENCASH_VALUE_AMT,ad.NET_CHANGE,a.ACCT_TYPE,a.CLIENT_ID,c.sf_client_id FROM wealthmanagement.wm_acct_details ad join wealthmanagement.wm_account a on ad.ACCT_ID=a.ACCT_ID join wealthmanagement.wm_client c on a.CLIENT_ID=c.CLIENT_ID where a.CLIENT_ID=:CLIENT_ID and ACCT_TYPE="Retirement"

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/json skipNullOn="everywhere" var curr=payload.CURR_ASSET_VAL_AMT[0 to -1] var encash=payload.ENCASH_VALUE_AMT[0 to -1] --- "retirement": { "salesforceClientId": payload[-1].sf_client_id, "currentvalueSummary" : sum(curr) as String {format: "0.00"}, "encashmentvalueSummary": sum(encash) as String {format: "0.00"}, "account": payload map()-> { "accountId": $.ACCT_ID, "clientId": $.CLIENT_ID, "planName": $.PROD_CODE, "accountType": $.ACCT_TYPE, "currentValue": $.CURR_ASSET_VAL_AMT, "encashmentValue": $.ENCASH_VALUE_AMT, "netChange": $.NET_CHANGE } }

db:select.db:sql: select ad.PROD_CODE,a.ACCT_ID,ad.CURR_ASSET_VAL_AMT,ad.ENCASH_VALUE_AMT,ad.NET_CHANGE,a.ACCT_TYPE,a.CLIENT_ID,c.sf_client_id FROM wealthmanagement.wm_acct_details ad join wealthmanagement.wm_account a on ad.ACCT_ID=a.ACCT_ID join wealthmanagement.wm_client c on a.CLIENT_ID=c.CLIENT_ID where a.CLIENT_ID=:CLIENT_ID and ACCT_TYPE="Protection"

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/json skipNullOn="everywhere" var curr=payload.CURR_ASSET_VAL_AMT[0 to -1] var encash=payload.ENCASH_VALUE_AMT[0 to -1] --- "protection": { "salesforceClientId": payload[-1].sf_client_id, "currentvalueSummary" : sum(curr) as String {format: "0.00"}, "encashmentvalueSummary": sum(encash) as String {format: "0.00"}, "account": payload map()-> { "accountId": $.ACCT_ID, "clientId": $.CLIENT_ID, "planName": $.PROD_CODE, "accountType": $.ACCT_TYPE, "currentValue": $.CURR_ASSET_VAL_AMT, "encashmentValue": $.ENCASH_VALUE_AMT, "netChange": $.NET_CHANGE } }
